Posts.Content: Janeypoos wrote: I recently had a lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy and am awaiting an appointment with the oncologist for my treatment plan. Now I have found a pea-sized lump inside the fatty part of my buttock. It doesn't hurt and there is no physical external sign of it. Could this be another tumour? Dx 10/25/2016, DCIS, Right, 2cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ (IHC) Dx 10/25/2016, IDC, Right, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ (IHC) Surgery 10/31/2016 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Surgery 10/31/2016 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Chemotherapy 12/1/2016 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Ellence (epirubicin) Hormonal Therapy Radiation Therapy Breast Hormonal Therapy Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Another worry! Janeypoos ksusan
